casebody.data:
No. 09-10776. Gary Hallford, Petitioner v. Superior Court of California, Sacramento County, et al. 561 U.S. 1051, 131 S. Ct. 50,

177 L. Ed. 2d 1140,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 5680. August 16, 2010.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Former decision, 561 U.S. 1032, 130 S. Ct. 3537, 177 L. Ed. 2d 1104, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 5465.
